Description: An accurate pass from a wide position (via corners, open plays and set pieces) into a specific area in front of the goal. The pass must be touched next by a teammate of the crossing player.
An official assist, as tracked by the official Premier League site. Fantasy assists (e.g. assists from rebounds) do not count.
If there was a 2nd assist, i.e a pass to create the opportunity for the player making the assist
A shot blocked by a defender and scored on the rebound.
A foul won that leads to a direct free kick scored.
A player forces a handball which results in a free kick scored.
A player shoots or passes, forcing a defender to put the ball in his own goal.
An assist assigned to a player who wins a penalty which is taken and scored by a teammate.
A shot saved by the goalkeeper but scored on the rebound.
A shot that hits the post and is scored on the rebound.
Passes which led to a clear cut scoring opportunity, e.g. one-on-one situation or a shot from just a few yards out.
Clear cut scoring opportunities which were not converted/scored.
Goals scored which were a clear cut chance
A cross blocked by the defender
Any goal attempt heading roughly on target toward goal which is blocked by a defender, where there are other defenders or a goalkeeper behind the blocker.
Goalkeeper attempts to claim the ball
Awarded to a player who played at least 60 minutes and whose team gave up 0 goals that game.

A dribble past a player attempted (contests always involve 2 players) - doesn't include "overrun" situations where the attacking player takes on an opponent but the ball runs away from them out of play or to an opponent
Total corners conceded by the defensive player/team
Total corners forced by the offensive player/team
Foul for play which could cause serious injury to an opponent
Fouls + (3 x Yellow Cards) + (6 x Red Cards)
Successful defensive clearance - where player under pressure kicks the ball clear of the defensive zone and/or out of play
Goals conceded by the team while the goalkeeper was on the field. This only applies to the goalkeeper.
Goal against from a shot inside the box
Goal against from a shot outside the box
Player scores 3 goals in a game
A loss by the player's team. The player only gets credit for the loss if he plays 60+ min, and is on his team's official Active roster or he is suspended.
Total attempted passes (excluding crosses, goal kicks, keeper throws and throw-ins)
Number of penalty kicks saved by the goalkeeper
Number of penalty kicks taken by the shooter
Player fouled within the penalty box (excludes any penalty kicks drawn for handballs)
Number of penalty kicks faced by the goalkeeper
Goalkeeper punches the ball clear from a high ball
If a player receives a red card and then has his red card rescinded at a later time, his red card will remain (i.e. he will have credit for both a red card and a red card rescinded).
Red card rescinded by the referee
Any shot against the goalkeeper, whether or not it missed the net
Any shot taken from inside the box
Any shot taken from outside the box

Full Name: Shots on Target Against Per Game
Description: Shots on Target Against Per Game
Total dribbles where a player beats an opponent - no overruns
Total successful passes where the ball ends in the final third of the pitch (excluding throw-ins, keeper throws, goal kicks and crosses).
Total tackles won (winning possession or putting the ball out of play)
A win by the player's team. The player only gets credit for the win if he plays 60+ min, and is on his team's official Active roster or he is suspended.
